snippet.title: Surfpunk - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Take a deep dive into the gameplay of SurfPunk in this latest trailer for the upcoming PvE co-op extraction ARPG. Learn about your mission for each run, strategies against enemies, exploration, and more. Surfpunk will be available on PC. Become a wave-shredding Raider in Surfpunk! Hop on your Rushboard, explore endless islands, and loot powerful ancient technology. Team up to hack ‘n slash through hordes of monsters and escape the chaos in style. Surf, Shred, Scavenge, Repeat!
